byline.original: By SARAH KAVANAGH, HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO and KATHERINE SCHULTEN

abstract: Ten different activities for introducing Occupy Wall Street to students.
snippet: Ten different activities for introducing Occupy Wall Street to students.
lead_paragraph: Overview | Why are protesters occupying Wall Street? What are they protesting, and what are their goals? In this lesson, students are introduced to Occupy Wall Street and then investigate the movement more deeply.

headline.main: Who Are the 99%? Ways to Teach About Occupy Wall Street
